item.title: 沙特工业生产增至 2022 年末以来最高水平
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的工业生产上升到近三年来最强劲的水平，与同期沙特经济增长同步，并受到石油产量扩大的推动。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s industrial production rose to the strongest level in nearly three years, in line with an increase in the kingdom’s economic growth for the same period and driven by an expansion in oil output.】

item.title: Bajaj 的 Iyer 说：利差扩大，印度长债值得买入
item.description: Bajaj Finserv Ltd.的一位高级官员表示，印度的长期限主权债券与短期限债券相比收益率差较大，因此是一个买入机会。【原文：India’s long-tenor sovereign bonds present a buying opportunity, thanks to a wide yield spread over shorter notes, according to a top official at Bajaj Finserv Ltd.】

item.title: 马丁-索瑞尔的 S4 公司称正与 MSQ 商谈合并事宜
item.description: 马丁-索瑞尔（Martin Sorrell）创办的广告公司 S4 Capital Plc 正在与私募股权公司 MSQ Partners 商谈合并事宜。【原文：S4 Capital Plc, the advertising agency founded by Martin Sorrell, is in talks to combine with private equity-owned MSQ Partners.】

item.title: ICICI 投资银行主管萨拉夫将转投零售经纪业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，领导 ICICI 证券有限公司投资银行部近 15 年的阿杰-萨拉夫（Ajay Saraf）将转任该印度公司零售股票经纪和财富业务主管。【原文：Ajay Saraf, who has led ICICI Securities Ltd.’s investment banking division for nearly 15 years, will move to become the head of the Indian firm’s retail stock broking and wealth business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行据称已出售至少 50 亿美元以提振卢比
item.description: 据熟悉交易情况的人士称，印度央行本月在在岸和离岸货币市场上抛售美元，以支撑卢比，因为卢比正朝着创纪录的低点疲软。【原文：India’s central bank sold US dollars across both onshore and offshore currency markets this month to prop up the rupee as it weakened toward a record low, according to people familiar with the transactions.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行支持的阿尔法银行计划对 12 亿欧元贷款实施 SRT
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，希腊阿尔法银行（Alpha Bank SA）已开始出售一项与企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移交易。【原文：Greece’s Alpha Bank SA has started the process of selling a significant risk transfer transaction tied to a portfolio of corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 对英国房东长达 10 个月的追逐迎来最后决战
item.description: 在 KKR & Co. 首次登门拜访约 10 个月后，这家英国最大的上市医疗保健业主的命运即将被决定，其结果岌岌可危，其影响可能远远超出一场单一的收购战。【原文：About 10 months after KKR & Co. first came knocking, the fate of the UK’s largest publicly traded healthcare landlord is about to be decided, with the outcome on a knife edge and implications that could extend far beyond a single takeover battle.】

item.title: Zetrix 利用 DeepSeek 知识为穆斯林推出人工智能聊天机器人
item.description: 一家马来西亚公司基于中国 DeepSeek 公司的开源人工智能技术，为穆斯林设计了一个人工智能大语言模型，这是公司瞄准约 20 亿人口市场的最新努力之一。【原文：A Malaysian company has designed an AI large language model for Muslims based on open-source AI knowhow from China’s DeepSeek, one of the latest efforts to target a market of some 2 billion people.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市保持稳定，英镑逼近 1.35 美元
新兴资产上涨，交易员从美国数据中寻找美联储线索
item.description: 在美元走软的支撑下，发展中市场的股票和货币纷纷走高，因为交易员们正关注美国的数据，这些数据可能会进一步巩固对美联储降息的押注。【原文：Stocks and currencies in developing markets are moving higher, bolstered by a weaker dollar as traders focus on data in the US which could further cement bets on interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与美国继续讨论投资和贸易协议
item.description: 据巴基斯坦国家财政部长称，巴基斯坦和美国官员目前正在讨论敲定贸易协议的更多细节，其中包括在获得南亚主要国家中最低关税后的投资。【原文：Pakistan and US officials are currently in discussions to finalize finer details of their trade deal that includes investments after securing the lowest tariff among major South Asian nations, according to Pakistan’s state finance minister.】

item.title: 据说新加坡忍者车公司在最新一轮融资中将估值减半
item.description: 物流初创企业 Ninja Van 正在洽谈内部融资，这将使其估值降低一半左右，这是科技公司在东南亚融资寒冬中艰难前行的最新迹象。【原文：Logistics startup Ninja Van is in talks to raise an internal round which will slash its valuation by about half, the latest sign of tech companies struggling to navigate the funding winter plaguing Southeast Asia.】

item.title: Klarna 通过 "先买后付 "套现。现在它想成为一家银行
item.description:
在支付巨头准备首次公开募股之际，它正试图说服数百万消费者使用其借记卡。【原文：

As the payments giant prepares an IPO, it’s trying to persuade millions of consumers to use its debit cards.

】

item.title: 马阿拉歌协议教父投奔美联储
item.description:
米兰呼吁动摇中央银行，这与世界贸易一样令人叹为观止。【原文：

Miran’s call to shake up the central bank is as breathtaking as it was for world trade.

】

item.title: 瑞士关税冲击暂时未对经济增长造成太大影响
item.description: 彭博社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，瑞士经济的韧性足以在未来一年左右的时间里基本摆脱美国关税的冲击。【原文：Switzerland’s economy will prove resilient enough to largely shake off the shock of US tariffs over the next year or so, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 欧洲央行被认为会将本轮周期的最后一次降息推迟到 12 月
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧洲央行官员将等到12月才会进行下一次降息，这很可能是本轮降息周期的最后一次行动。【原文：European Central Bank officials will wait until December to deliver their next interest-rate cut in what is likely to be the final move in the cycle, a Bloomberg survey showed.】

item.title: Altor 支持的 Aira 公司为热泵扩张融资 1.5 亿欧元
item.description: 瑞典住宅供暖初创企业 Aira Group AB 从包括金融家 Harald Mix 在内的现有投资者处获得了 1.5 亿欧元（1.74 亿美元）的新资金。【原文：Swedish residential heating startup Aira Group AB raised €150 million ($174 million) in new funding from existing investors including the financier Harald Mix.】

item.title: 西班牙银行政治风波不断，官员纷纷离职
item.description: 去年 9 月，何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（José Luis Escrivá）就任西班牙银行行长，一年后，在他的领导下，一系列高调离职的政治风暴仍在肆虐。【原文：A political storm that erupted when José Luis Escrivá became Bank of Spain chief last September is still raging a year later after a series of high-profile exits under his watch.】

item.title: 铁矿石因报道中国钢厂将暂时停产而上涨
item.description: 一家中国咨询公司称，由于空气污染问题，当局已通知几家钢厂需要在本月晚些时候暂时停产，铁矿石因此上涨。【原文：Iron ore gained after a Chinese consultancy said several steel mills had been told by authorities they will need to temporarily halt production later this month due to air-pollution concerns.】

item.title: 增长风险上升，高盛再次青睐亚洲高等级债务
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has returned to a preference for investment-grade dollar bonds over high-yield debt in Asia, citing worries about the US economy and expectations of a growth-friendly Federal Reserve.】

item.title: XPeng 的 Brian Gu 以 2,200 万美元买下香港豪宅
item.description: 电动汽车制造商新鹏公司副董事长兼联席总裁在香港购买了一套豪宅，而香港的房地产市场正徘徊在九年来的最低点。【原文：The vice chairman and co-president of electric vehicle maker XPeng Inc. bought a luxury home in Hong Kong, as the city’s property market hovers around a nine-year low.】

item.title: 由于资金问题，新西兰央行可能在未来两个月内裁员五分之一
item.description: 新西兰中央银行计划在未来两个月内裁员约五分之一，以应对政府限制其资金的决定。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank plans to cut about a fifth of its workforce in the next two months in response to the government’s decision to limit its funding.】

item.title: 印度电子制造商在美国关税困境中失去动力
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 国债买家提振代币，以太币引领周末加密货币涨势
item.description: 随着机构投资者和公司财务买家的需求增加，排名第二的加密货币以太币在上周末超越了竞争对手，引领了数字资产的广泛反弹。【原文：Second-ranked cryptocurrency Ether outpaced rivals over the weekend to lead a broad rally in digital assets, as demand from institutional investors and corporate treasury buyers builds.】

item.title: 建筑商中国南城被香港法院勒令清盘
item.description: 开发商中国南城控股有限公司（China South City Holdings Ltd.）被香港高等法院下令清盘，成为自中国恒大集团（China Evergrande Group）以来被清盘的资产规模最大的中国建筑商。【原文：Developer China South City Holdings Ltd. was ordered to liquidate by Hong Kong’s High Court, making it the biggest Chinese builder by assets to be wound up since China Evergrande Group.】

item.title: 高盛称美国消费者将首当其冲承担关税成本
item.description: 根据高盛集团的研究，美国公司迄今已消化了唐纳德-特朗普关税的大部分成本，但负担正越来越多地转移到消费者身上。【原文：US companies have so far absorbed most of the costs of Donald Trump’s tariffs, but the burden is increasingly going to shift to consumers, according to research by Goldman Sachs.】

item.title: 中国流感疫苗生产商在香港首次交易中大涨
item.description: 在散户投资者纷纷涌入这家中国疫苗生产商的首次公开募股之后，艾博生物科技公司（Ab&Bio-Tech）在香港的首次交易飙升高达 169%。【原文：Ab&B Bio-Tech soared as much as 169% in its trading debut in Hong Kong, after retail investors flocked to the Chinese vaccine maker’s initial public offering.】

item.title: 货币交易员关注澳元和欧元，押注看跌美元
item.description: 近期美国经济数据令人失望，期权交易商正利用澳元和欧元等货币表达看跌美元的观点。【原文：Options traders are using currencies such as the Australian dollar and euro to express bearish US dollar views after recent disappointing American economic data.】

item.title: CATL 暂停中国矿山运营后，锂股票大涨
item.description: 周一早盘，在澳大利亚上市的锂矿公司股价跳涨，此前，当代安派瑞科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.随着中国政府打击整个经济领域的产能过剩，澳大利亚上市锂矿公司的股票周一早盘跳水。【原文：Shares of Australian-listed lithium miners jumped early on Monday, after a major Chinese mine owned by Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. suspended production, spurring hopes of wider output curbs as Beijing cracks down on overcapacity across the economy.】

item.title: 关税减免、外资流入，泰国资产涨势将延续
item.description: 在贸易紧张局势缓和以及外国投资者对当地股票兴趣回升的推动下，泰铢本季度的涨势似乎有望延续。【原文：The Thai baht’s rally this quarter looks poised to extend, fueled by easing trade tensions and a resurgence of foreign interest in local equities.】
